body_html:
Take a look at learn_runner.tune: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/learn_runner.py#L115

In theory, all that needs to be done is to implement one such Tuner object which does (say) grid search, or something more clever.

I apologize -- the documentation on this is extremely sparse, but please ask questions if the intended use is unclear from the code and comments.

body:
Take a look at `learn_runner.tune`: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/learn_runner.py#L115

In theory, all that needs to be done is to implement one such `Tuner` object which does (say) grid search, or something more clever. 

I apologize -- the documentation on this is extremely sparse, but please ask questions if the intended use is unclear from the code and comments.
